title: UN BAN ME RIGHT NOW THIS IS'NT  FAIR
body:
Game 1
LifeStyleBACON: press d and f and it will give u 1000 gold trust me
LifeStyleBACON: sup no ward
LifeStyleBACON: fk gg wp
LifeStyleBACON: wtf
LifeStyleBACON: wtf my team
LifeStyleBACON: WTF
LifeStyleBACON: dude wtf are u talkign about i got adc
LifeStyleBACON: not my fault u guys were grouping and were gonan duo bot
LifeStyleBACON: sucks to suck
LifeStyleBACON: straight up eveyrone on my team afk plz except me
LifeStyleBACON: afk right now
LifeStyleBACON: report my team inting get all 4 of them banned
LifeStyleBACON: thats nice u can team agaisnt me i hoenslty dont care reaport and move on
LifeStyleBACON: bltiz ur fk noob so stfu why does everyone think they are good jsut cuase they get fed 1 game and think they earn the right to trash talk -.-
LifeStyleBACON: lol the league salt is real xD
LifeStyleBACON: ohhh poor baby got adc taken away its hte end of the world
LifeStyleBACON: waaah everyone crie cri cri xD
LifeStyleBACON: today is a good day for me hiter birthday
LifeStyleBACON: hoenslty im not even gonan ask u 2 report my reports are always creditable so ill just report htem
LifeStyleBACON: bltiz u cant land a hook even when im in front off u
LifeStyleBACON: lol
LifeStyleBACON: suree and the funny thing was i was hte only one in front of u XD
LifeStyleBACON: ahahaha
LifeStyleBACON: sure buddy
LifeStyleBACON: report my team





I WAS BANNED FOR THIS WTF RIOT, this is so fking unfair, excuse my swearing but wtf seriously, i spent so much money for one and if this stays im done with lol and u can go fk ur self. Yes i understand that i was being toxic/salty but lets be honest everyone in FKING LEAGUE IS TOXIC, go to every fkign ranked game somone is toxic so ban everyone that plays ranked...hmm u dont do that and yet u ban me for being toxic in a fking normal game. I got fking grouped on just cause they were 4 people queue and they fking trolled the game and inting like fk to the pOINT WHERE WE LOST THE GAME IN FKING 14 MINUTES with the enemy team having more than 42 kills...WTF...who wouldnt get angry over this, no fking normal person, dont even tell me to stay quiet and do nothing in these situations cuase u dont stay fking calm cause i felt like i deserve justice and i realized that so i stopped toxic and just said i would report my team...and i get banned wow....if i got banned for this i except the other 4 to get banned....wtf and they enemy team also reported me cause my fking team asked for reports all cause I GOT ADC FIRST AND THEY DIDNT...BOOO WHOO SUCKS TO SUCK. I deserve justice maybye a 5 min game restriction for the toxicity...not a fkign permenant ban for my team bing DICKS and tilting me...NO FKING IDIOT WOULD REMAIN CALM AND ignore when all 9 players decide to pick on you..I WANT JUSTICE, if i got permentant banned i want all those other players to get permenant banned or my ban lifted, cause this aint fair at all. I KNOW FOR A FACT THAT ASKING FOR REPORTS IS not allowed so permentant ban my whole team for that IMMEDIETLY. THE NUMBER OF PEOPLE REPORTING YOU SHOULDNT MATTER BECAUSE IT THE CREDIBETLITY THAT MATTERS, so dont go fkign banning people for such a fk reason. 

IM GIVING YOU 2 fking choices:

1.I get permenent banned, my whole team should get permenent banned...THE END
2. Lift my ban

I DONt DESERVE THIS BULLSHIT...


Ik i am swearing a lot but im seriously upset right now, and i ask again to excuse my language.

tY

replies.body:
>IM GIVING YOU 2 fking choices:

HAHAHAHHAHAHHAHAHAHHAHHA

YOU ARE GIVING RIOT CHOICES

HAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHHAHAHAHA

I think their choice was to ban you xDDDDDD

Under these pretenses... of course
http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/legal/termsofuse
hahahhahahahahahahah

Absolutely fair and definitely deserved.

Just the fact you think you can threaten riot.. how old are you, 11? 13? 
Nobody cares. you have no meaning, no authority, and no sense, but you do have a massively inflated ego and sense of your own importance. Having it deflated should help you have a better life.

correction i do have authroity they stole my money i wnat it back...the end of discusion

Let's sue Riot and all game companies to own our accounts, why should they be allowed to ban us if we have paid or put a significant amount of time into a game?
Would a furniture store come take your couch back after you paid for it for tearing up a flamer with your words? Why should game companies be allowed to do it? Hit me up mang....lets do this and OWN OUR ACCOUNTS!
You are an idiot.

same

I'm an idiot :P
I wouldn't say this is a permaban situation probably like a chat ban or a suspension. He was being a dick but he wasnt feeding or afking, though i can agree he is very toxic.

> [{quoted}](name=SeeingEyeHamster,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=07EeqzXU,comment-id=00080001,timestamp=2017-04-21T16:37:38.024+0000)
>
> I wouldn't say this is a permaban situation probably like a chat ban or a suspension. He was being a dick but he wasnt feeding or afking, though i can agree he is very toxic.

Yes, but he has also already admitted to being toxic in previous games. With this information we can assume he has climbed the tier list of punishment. What may have normally been a chat restriction dug the nail into a perm ban. I'd also wager he just got off a two week ban not long ago.
Well im on a 2 week suspension for not even being toxic so...

Did you already go through the two chat restrictions before that? 10 game and 25 game I think.

If so, the way I understand it, is you are essentially on the radar and even a sarcastic remark or something misunderstood would trigger the ban. When you get off it, I would advise only typing necessary items. I.E. swapping lanes or champions. When summoners are used. Just ping. 

Please don't misunderstand. I am simply trying to help clear any misinterpretations, and small ideas to help.
no i did not get those chat bans

> [{quoted}](name=SeeingEyeHamster,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=07EeqzXU,comment-id=000800010000000000000000,timestamp=2017-04-21T21:21:02.263+0000)
>
> no i did not get those chat bans

Odd. I'm basing it off some other posts you have done, but even if they are a friend you should refrain from calling anyone a ####### feeder or whatever. An automated system can not detect sarcasm. Even if someone knew you were joking, could have even been your friend, if even 1 reported then it found cause in that. Sorry man. I hope something can be done.

> [{quoted}](name=LifeStyleBACON,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=07EeqzXU,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-04-21T02:27:01.152+0000)
> 
> im done with lol 

Believe it or not, they actually want the toxics out of league.

So threatening to leave isn't a part of the bargain.

if they wnat toxics out of league ban everyone...the end cause EVERYOEN IN FKING LEAGUE IS SALTY AND TOXIC, 30% say it out loud in normals, and 70% dont but THINK it in normals, and in ranked 99% of the people are toxic and scream and say stuff like bitches, (aka me) , and 1% stay quiet.. so ban everyone RIOT if u wnat toxics out BAN BAN BAN 

I want my money back... u cant just ban me and take my money fk faces.....
Let's sue Riot and all game companies to own our accounts, why should they be allowed to ban us if we have paid or put a significant amount of time into a game?
Would a furniture store come take your couch back after you paid for it for tearing up a flamer with your words? Why should game companies be allowed to do it? Hit me up mang....lets do this and OWN OUR ACCOUNTS!

> [{quoted}](name=LifeStyleBACON,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=07EeqzXU,comment-id=00070000,timestamp=2017-04-21T03:13:40.373+0000)
>
> Let's sue Riot and all game companies to own our accounts, why should they be allowed to ban us if we have paid or put a significant amount of time into a game?
> Would a furniture store come take your couch back after you paid for it for tearing up a flamer with your words? Why should game companies be allowed to do it? Hit me up mang....lets do this and OWN OUR ACCOUNTS!

sure ... do it. 

let me know how it goes ok?

I especially love to know how much you spent on the lawyer so I can laugh at your misery.
He's gonna have to save up a ton of launch money to affort a lawyer :c

First; I feel there are other games in this ban.

Second; I feel there are more sections to this game chat log than what you posted.

Third; You harassed a whole hell of a lot.

Fourth; You do kind of deserve this, especially if you have been perma'd That means you probably had a 14 day ban already.
Bruh I have gotten perma banned 4 times and I never bitched about. If you're gonna be toxic, don't be surprised when you see your account get the ban hammer.

You do deserve it. That game was only the final nail in the coffin, they don't ban you off one game. If your team were being dicks like you claim, it doesn't matter. That does not mean you can flame back. That gets you both banned. Use the command /mute all if they're harassing you.

Forthermore, the number of reports indeed doesn't matter. If 9 or 1 person report you in one game it is weighted the same. You just don't know how the system works.

so what... my other gmaes yes i did dersve but no that game and thats all that should matter, THIS GAME and i want proof they got permenant banned.. PREVIOUS GAMES SHOULD STACK AND IF THEY DO THEY should list in the reasons why you got banned and proof with the game1, game2, game3, i got only 1 game and it was tis

If you deserved it in your other games than that is enough on its own. This game you also deserved it and it was the last straw. They don't show you all the games in client, check your email linked with your account.
I wnat my money back then...and illl leave this place forever or im gonna spam troll this community with memes

Why would they give you your money back? Not only did you literally sign up for it and agree to it, but you got a service with your money. You were able to use your skins and champions you bought with RP.

correction legally i can screw them cause i bought those services permenetly the skins and champions so i wanna use them so let me use them riot i did pay money for it why can i use them....i want my skins and champions back or the money refunded garbage people

> [{quoted}](name=LifeStyleBACON,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=07EeqzXU,comment-id=000500000000000000010000,timestamp=2017-04-21T03:19:04.079+0000)
>
> correction legally i can screw them cause i bought those services permenetly the skins and champions so i wanna use them so let me use them riot i did pay money for it why can i use them....i want my skins and champions back or the money refunded garbage people

It says in the contract that you did not buy them as a possession, but as a right to use them. It's a free to play game mate; instead of being a little brat, just be thankful you didn't have to pay on a monthly basis to play.

No, no you did not. Had you bothered to read the ToS agreement that you had to agree to in order to play the game, you bought a license to use them which could be revoked at any time for any reason. You did not buy ownership of the skins, you bought a revoke able license. It is spelled out in the agreement.

Go ahead, brat. I want to see you try that. 
It should be worth a few cheap laughs, considering anything you post can be deleted in about .5 seconds, or simply laughed at and ignored.

How old are you?  You speak (both in game and on the forums) as though you're about 13.  Grow up.  

Also, giving ultimatums when you have absolutely no power in a situation is just sad, don't do it.
http://weknowmemes.com/generator/uploads/generated/g1391742504531596472.jpg

LifeStyleBACON: report my team inting get all 4 of them banned

Threats like that are what got you banned. Riot doesn't serve you as the supreme leader of the universe. 

LifeStyleBACON: ohhh poor baby got adc taken away its hte end of the world

Did you steal someone's role and then brag about it?

I feel like the fact that you came here to talk about this means you are either trying to troll or just honestly don't understand what you did wrong...and both seem to justify this ban, have fun with that

P.S. demanding you get what you want has never worked with this company, act like a grown up in both accepting your ban for doing something dumb and not throwing a tantrum

thats cause i did nothign fkign wrong wrong....go spectate every fking LOL RANKED GAME and ban everyone that is toxic and in 2 days  u will have 30 million permentent bans thats rigth cause every ranked game always has 3+ people that swear and rage and are toxicc and that is soemthing u need to accept, and i didnt start this fight, they did and i got triggered so i  responsed cuase im a fkign NORMAL PERSON and i get permenent banned and they dont that is ouright bullSHIT i wnat proff they got permentent banned or i am gonna troll this communnity boards,.

The first time I played a ranked game I was scared of all the toxic people. Yes there was toxic people, but I made a new friend who was very nice and I still play games with them. Not all people are toxic, sure they can be toxic at times but atleast they control their toxicity.

A permanent ban is warranted by multiple offenses. You may say this is the only game, but perma-bans are not given out till you have had at least one 14 day ban and that also requires typically a few 1 day or 1 week bans before it. Also if you think that everyone is toxic like this and does what you do then just look at all the comments disagreeing with you in this thread alone, there is at least 5 others besides me here and i can say I have at least 10 people I know personally and have played ranked with who don't do this either which leads me to believe it is not every single person who plays this game.

> LifeStyleBACON: fk gg wp

Yeah, this is the telltale phrase of someone who deserves a permaban. See you in 2200!

>  i spent so much money for one and if this stays im done with lol

Permabans are Riot's way of saying that they don't want either you or your money around anymore. They want you to be done with LoL. You could submit a ticket, but with this tone, you probably won't get anything done. 

Reform and make a new account if you want to keep on playing. My friend did: https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/yTUPcEd7-shellshocked

everyont fking does that dont even tell me that u dont do that in ranked if u give 3 kills in a fight at jg u will say , "fk gg wp" its called 1 sarcasm or 2 seriois menat in my case seirous cuase they typed they were gonan troll and init and run into the jg and killed themselves
No...no, I don't do GG calls in the first few minutes of the game. Especially no GGEZ calls.
okay so what if i said that i still tried that gmae and ended with 4/4 not 1/9 or 1/20 or 1/1000 like my team...

I've curbstomped games so pathetically that the enemy team surrendered at 19. I didn't make an early GG call or say GGEZ. generally, NEVER say ggez. If you do that, you are purposely trying to piss people off after the advantage gained by pissing them off doesn't matter anymore. Early GG calls ruin morale for you and everyone else. 

There is absolutely no point in saying those things, you are literally ONLY lowering your own chances to win.

Noooot really. When you signed up for League, you kind of singed a contract that basically says "if my account is banned, I agree that there will be no refund of any sort." Read the Terms of Use next time kid.

So what's this, account #3?

once ur permabanned its gg ur never getting ur account back.
Looks like more and more toxic people are getting permabanned. Good job Riot!

Besides if you read the TOU you would know that all content is owned by RIot and we are just "borrowing it" really. So even if you paid for it that doesn't matter.

> I WAS BANNED FOR THIS WTF RIOT, this is so fking unfair, excuse my swearing but wtf seriously, i spent so much money for one and if this stays im done with lol and u can go fk ur self. Yes i understand that i was being toxic/salty but lets be honest everyone in FKING LEAGUE IS TOXIC, go to every fkign ranked game somone is toxic so ban everyone that plays ranked...hmm u dont do that and yet u ban me for being toxic in a fking normal game. I got fking grouped on just cause they were 4 people queue and they fking trolled the game and inting like fk to the pOINT WHERE WE LOST THE GAME IN FKING 14 MINUTES with the enemy team having more than 42 kills...WTF...who wouldnt get angry over this, no fking normal person, dont even tell me to stay quiet and do nothing in these situations cuase u dont stay fking calm cause i felt like i deserve justice and i realized that so i stopped toxic and just said i would report my team...and i get banned wow....if i got banned for this i except the other 4 to get banned....wtf and they enemy team also reported me cause my fking team asked for reports all cause I GOT ADC FIRST AND THEY DIDNT...BOOO WHOO SUCKS TO SUCK. I deserve justice maybye a 5 min game restriction for the toxicity...not a fkign permenant ban for my team bing DICKS and tilting me...NO FKING IDIOT WOULD REMAIN CALM AND ignore when all 9 players decide to pick on you..I WANT JUSTICE, if i got permentant banned i want all those other players to get permenant banned or my ban lifted, cause this aint fair at all. I KNOW FOR A FACT THAT ASKING FOR REPORTS IS not allowed so permentant ban my whole team for that IMMEDIETLY. THE NUMBER OF PEOPLE REPORTING YOU SHOULDNT MATTER BECAUSE IT THE CREDIBETLITY THAT MATTERS, so dont go fkign banning people for such a fk reason.
